content:
please refer to this to create the checklist:

Module 1: The Foundation

Systems - Understanding the systems required for an AI-powered digital business
The Framework - Overview of the complete framework of all 3 phases
Creating Digital Assets - The importance of creating digital assets and how it creates wealth
Tools Needed - Overview of AI tools needed to build the business
Common Mistakes - Common mistakes people make when using AI in their digital business
Foundation Checklist - A checklist to ensure students understand everything covered in this module
